block.copycats.copycat_beam.tooltip.beha: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
block.copycats.copycat_beam.tooltip.summ: _Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative beam.
block.copycats.copycat_block.tooltip.beh: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
block.copycats.copycat_block.tooltip.sum: _Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative clone.
block.copycats.copycat_board.tooltip.beh: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
block.copycats.copycat_board.tooltip.sum: _Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative board. Multiple boards can be placed in the same block space.
block.copycats.copycat_byte.tooltip.beha: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
block.copycats.copycat_byte.tooltip.summ: _Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative mini-block. Note: no connected textures.
block.copycats.copycat_fence.tooltip.beh: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
block.copycats.copycat_fence.tooltip.sum: _Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative fence.
block.copycats.copycat_fence_gate.toolti: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into a functional fence gate.
block.copycats.copycat_slab.tooltip.beha: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
block.copycats.copycat_slab.tooltip.summ: _Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative slab. Can be placed _vertically_.
block.copycats.copycat_stairs.tooltip.be: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
block.copycats.copycat_stairs.tooltip.su: _Converts_ any _full block_ into decorative stairs. Note: buggy connected textures.
Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into a functional trapdoor.
block.copycats.copycat_vertical_step.too: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative vertical step.
block.copycats.copycat_wall.tooltip.beha: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
block.copycats.copycat_wall.tooltip.summ: _Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative wall.
item.copycats.copycat_box.tooltip.behavi: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
item.copycats.copycat_box.tooltip.summar: _Copycat boards_ pre-assembled into a box for convenient placement.
item.copycats.copycat_catwalk.tooltip.be: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
item.copycats.copycat_catwalk.tooltip.su: _Copycat boards_ pre-assembled into a catwalk for convenient placement.
block.copycats.copycat_layer.tooltip.beh: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
block.copycats.copycat_layer.tooltip.sum: _Converts_ any _full block_ into decorative layers. Layers can be stacked till it reaches a full block in size.
